title: Add ralph projects add/remove/list commands
description: Manage projects registry at ~/.config/ralphtools/projects.json for launcher generation.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add ralph-projects() function with subcommands: add, remove, list
ralph-projects add <name> <path> adds project to projects.json
ralph-projects remove <name> removes project from registry
ralph-projects list shows all registered projects
Store: name, path, mcps (optional array), created timestamp
